scripts.dev:user: concurrently -n BUILD_USER,NODE_USER -k "pnpm nx build user-service --watch" "wait-on dist/apps/user-service/main.js && nodemon dist/apps/user-service/main.js"
scripts.dev:product: concurrently -n BUILD_PROD,NODE_PROD -k "pnpm nx build product-service --watch" "wait-on dist/apps/product-service/main.js && nodemon dist/apps/product-service/main.js"
scripts.dev:order: concurrently -n BUILD_ORD,NODE_ORD -k "pnpm nx build order-service --watch" "wait-on dist/apps/order-service/main.js && nodemon dist/apps/order-service/main.js"
scripts.dev:payment: concurrently -n BUILD_PAY,NODE_PAY -k "pnpm nx build payment-service --watch" "wait-on dist/apps/payment-service/main.js && nodemon dist/apps/payment-service/main.js"
scripts.dev:cart: concurrently -n BUILD_CART,NODE_CART -k "pnpm nx build cart-service --watch" "wait-on dist/apps/cart-service/main.js && nodemon dist/apps/cart-service/main.js"
scripts.dev:gateway: concurrently -n BUILD_GATE,NODE_GATE -k "pnpm nx build api-gateway --watch" "wait-on dist/apps/api-gateway/main.js && nodemon dist/apps/api-gateway/main.js"
scripts.dev:noti: concurrently -n BUILD_NOTI,NODE_NOTI -k "pnpm nx build notification-service --watch" "wait-on dist/apps/notification-service/main.js && node notify.js Notification 50056 && nodemon dist/apps/notification-service/main.js"
